data.text: @dginchelsea Welcome aboard! Can't wait to have you in our First Suite!
Asiana Airlines wins Best International First Class Wine on Global Traveler Magazine's "Wines on the Wing" survey! http://t.co/yPSnxdWWjG
RT @Flyasiana: #OZFLT Due to bad weather around Ulsan Airport, today's 1st GMP/USN flights(OZ8601/02) are canceled. ※FLT status→ http://t.c…
@PonderalaVerdad Thanks! Have a great week!
The beautiful city that is #Seattle: http://t.co/Lc5ppGzIAY (Thanks to @phodan7 for the photo!)
Happy Tuesday! Hope you had a great 3-day weekend. Time to get back into the grind! http://t.co/By08drWIKP (Photo by @AirbusA380__)
@FiratControl Thanks for capturing this photo of our cargo plane!
#FBF to when #BTS took a ride with us to work on their album! Thanks for coming on board! http://t.co/2Wk4bMpFAd http://t.co/Zvw9w8sVTa
Here's the Queen taking off from #LAX. Anybody miss this #B747 yet? #FlashbackFriday #FBF http://t.co/RkGJH9d0vw
@archelmorales Thanks for the mention in your article! We appreciate it. :)
@jonjws1 Thanks for the photo! :)
@vareberg_harvey Hello, sorry to have you disappointed. Please feel free to let us know how we could improve: http://t.co/QBo48a9Pyi
@quade181 Beautiful! Thanks for sharing the photo! :)
@DicksBadkamers Please DM us with the e-ticket number and full name and we will forward it to our Customer Relations Team. Thank you!
@DicksBadkamers  Hello, please DM us with info so that we may forward it to the proper department to get immediate assistance. Thank you!
How far are you from achieving #AsianaClub #Platinum status? Once a Platinum, always a Platinum! #ffp #travel #ASIANA http://t.co/sllGUOCsNL
@thatsjustal Sweet! Thanks for sharing the photo! :)
There are only a few days left to take advantage of #Business Class special fares to #Asia! http://t.co/3srxWZ6nbK http://t.co/lIvHotButc
#BusinessSmartium #asianaairlines http://t.co/ZCSHftKmES
@LeidyRu75169273 Thanks for the love! Hope to have you on board soon.
@therachaelway Hello! Following. Please DM us with your info so we can forward it to the proper team. Thank you!
Glad you received the #B747 aircraft model! RT "@BLGranucci: Sweet 747 model from @AsianaAirlines! Thanks so much! http://t.co/CE9ZWBl1PX"
@JCreatureTravel Thanks, we've sent a reply to the DM.
You already know you can earn miles from flying, but don't forget to earn more from hotels! See our list of partners: http://t.co/oH2UiDD2FH
@JCreatureTravel Hello Jeanine, sorry to hear that. Please send us a DM and we will forward to the appropriate team. Thank you!
Don't leave your best friend - take them with you! Call our reservation center for more info. Happy National Dog Day! http://t.co/GuCNCyupeZ
Only a few more days left of the Early Bird Special on the #ASIANA380 from LAX to Asia! http://t.co/mXCpK6H12U http://t.co/bTdJjVbBoa
Day or Night? Check out @koreatourism's beautiful photos of Korea and tell us which you prefer! http://t.co/P2mKn6rY9y
RT @tweetbypremier: World’s Largest Aircraft in @AsianaAirlines Livery: http://t.co/YSDEZnhcaM #airbus #A380 #avgeek http://t.co/MuoYSmosgh
@RachelAndJun We're glad it's been resolved! Have a great rest of the week, and safe travels!
@papamozo @princededwards Thanks for mentioning us! We appreciate it very much. Hope you have a wonderful week!
@RachelAndJun Hello, sorry for the inconvenience. Please DM us with your e-ticket # and we'll forward it to the proper team to look into it.
@erikaaamags Hello, you may contact our reservation center at (800)227-4262 for booking inquiries. Thank you!
@raimonescapa You might want to double-check the address you sent it to. The e-mail address should be customerus[at]http://t.co/I44HUkMKFg.
@raimonescapa Hello, you may contact our Reservations Center at (800)227-4262 for inquiries regarding baggage. Thank you!
Snapshot of the first time the #ASIANA380 landed at #LAX on August 20th, 2014! #a380 #Airbus… http://t.co/9uFxgo6K8O
@jonberrydesign Thank you! We're loving how it looks on this superjumbo, too!
@misssoojin @Flyasiana Thanks for the love! Hope you can join us on the ICN-LAX routes some day!
Visit our Facebook [http://t.co/cDcnIYtsoD] or Google+ [http://t.co/NBePVbRlS9] for more photos from yesterday's #ASIANA380 inauguration!
RT @flyLAXairport: [PIC] Yesterday we officially welcomed @AsianaAirlines to the LAX @Airbus A380 family! c: Jay Berkowitz/B.T./LAWA http:/…
@BLGranucci @CaliTenkey @TheRustyMav @quade181 @thatsjustal ... send you your prize! We're unable to DM without a follow. Thanks!
@BLGranucci @CaliTenkey @TheRustyMav @quade181 @thatsjustal Please DM us with your full name, address & phone number so that we can ...
@thatsjustal Please follow us so that we are able to send you a DM!  Thank you!
Congrats @BLGranucci @CaliTenkey @TheRustyMav @quade181 @thatsjustal We're giving you each a #B747 aircraft model! Please check DM for info!
@coreyteague @a380fanclub Beautiful! Thank you! :)
@teague_ryan Thanks for catching our inaugural flight! Looks beautiful!
@BarryKowalski1 No, our #ASIANA380 is replacing the #B747 that operated the LAX-ICN routes.
@coreyteague @a380fanclub Did you take that shot? We want proof!
RT @mikuckis: Exciting day for @AsianaAirlines!  Should be an awesome flight! http://t.co/taI97O6s5C
Gate 152 at #LAX! #ASIANA380 @ Los Angeles International Airport (LAX) http://t.co/w7L8pLmMSP
@YuniardiS It's a 1:200 model!
@StaceyCresswell Amazing! Thanks for the shout-out! Hope to see you on board again soon!
@Jadie_Dawson Our new #ASIANA380 will operate the #LAX-#ICN route starting Wednesday, Aug. 20th via OZ202/201!
To commemorate the many years with our #B747 on the LAX-ICN routes, we're giving away 747 aircraft models! RT to win! http://t.co/tnaeExv8Wc
@kenshin_77 Maybe you can catch it sometime on the ICN-FRA route! :)
@orpheon Maybe you can catch it on our ICN-FRA routes! :)
@tiramixu Hello~ the #b747 will be operating the FRA-ICN routes afterwards. Thank you for asking!
As much as we're excited for the #ASIANA380, we're sad to see you go Queen #B747. Thanks for the memories. Farewell~ http://t.co/23AooJKKOB
Our last #B747 arrival and take-off at LAX... http://t.co/fFxSmaOpz8
Do you know what's coming to #LAX this Wednesday? #airbus #a380 #asianaairlines #travel #fly http://t.co/0nYmz1VbvQ
TWO days left until the arrival of the #ASIANA380 inaugural flight at #LAX! http://t.co/qXabRtfQjF
@raimonescapa Hello, please e-mail customerus[at]http://t.co/I44HUl4TTo! Thank you.
Follow us on Instagram! http://t.co/avUbWUksRT #ASIANA380 #comingsoon #LAX #a380
Less than 5 days away from #ASIANA380 launch LAX-ICN route! Can u help us reach 5000 followers on Instagram by then? http://t.co/TtQamxHin0
"If we were meant to stay in one place, we’d have roots instead of feet." – Rachel Wolchin #travelquotes #ASIANA380 http://t.co/nYuacixvYU
Flying #AsianaAirlines? Be sure to take advantage of discounts w/ the Magic Boarding Pass! http://t.co/njzr02i6xq http://t.co/gp3AczktJ4
@FollowMe2Taiwan Hello, please follow & DM us with your info. We can assist to look into your reservation. Thank you!
@BedfordBootBoy Welcome aboard!
@universe_chic ...or via an online travel agency. You may also contact our reservation center at 800-227-4262. Thank you!
@universe_chic Hello Gloria! Congrats on your big win! Once you have your dates set, you may purchase your friend's ticket on our website...
@visheshjoshi Hello, sorry to hear you're having a hard time. How can we help?
We are exactly ONE week away from the launch of the #ASIANA380 on the #LAX-#ICN routes! Are you… http://t.co/Ah8zlKMxGy
RT @flyLAXairport: Get ready to welcome 8th member of LAX A380 family as @AsianaAirlines inaugurates A380 service, Aug. 20. Cameras out! ht…
Welcome to Business Smartium class on Asiana! http://t.co/GM3VsAfSNv (Photo by @Ale_Na_va -- Thanks!)
Check in, please! #FirstClass #StarAlliance #AsianaAirlines http://t.co/pqGRDVIgrz
Our friend @jeannie1ma93 swung by to pick up her #KCON2014 tickets! Hope everyone enjoys the show this weekend! http://t.co/QDnRofuFko
@asamae2kn Wonderful! Can't wait to have you on board in 2015!
@rkaradi Can't wait to have you on board in the wintertime! :)
Sweet dreams in Asiana's First Suite! #asiana380 #b777 #asianaairlines http://t.co/2AamxfBsye
Congrats @jeannie1ma93! We're giving you a pair of tickets to #KCON2014 this Sunday! :) We'll DM you for info! http://t.co/njjpew8GLX
Which aircraft do you like more: #B747 or #A380? http://t.co/xT2m1JNkV3
Did you participate in our "Fly me to the ASIANA380" Sweepstakes? Winners have been announced here! http://t.co/S4gBFTL4t4
@chansa96 No tears allowed! :') Maybe just a little...
@captainlaylahh We wouldn't want you to cry, but we understand the fandom! :')
@luchagors Hopefully your wishes will come true!
@TheTeamWWE We understand the fandom! :)
@exoliration Let's hope for the best!
@sisisicece Wow! That's dedication! :)
@SimplyTephie Sorry, no airfare.. Only concert tickets!
Alright! We're giving away 1 pair of #KCON2014 tix for the SUNDAY show! RT and tell us who you want to see most! http://t.co/vCjCNIAVyx
Happy Thursday, tweeps! Here's a little travel inspiration for you: http://t.co/S3XCbuglBx (Thanks for the photo @asamae2kn!) #ASIANA380
Pssst! Couldn't get a hold of #KCON2014 tickets? We may have some good news for you. Stick around!
@Brendita13 Yes! We will be there!
Which #KPOP fans are excited for #KCON2014 this weekend?
@BarryKowalski1 Agree, wailing infants are difficult to be around!
@jsunnypants Yes! Good thing we have toothbrushes, toothpaste and mouthwash on our flights! ;)
@ninja_squirellz We couldn't agree more! Those are some useful items to pass time on a flight!
Hey Tweeps! What are some of your #travel essentials? What are some items that you MUST have on a flight?
@audreyuuu Glad you enjoyed ICN!

errors.title: Authorization Error
errors.detail: Sorry, you are not authorized to see the user with entities.mentions.username: [Erikaaamags].
